articles.author: BILD
articles.title: Finale der Basketball-WM: Deutschland gegen Serbien läuft heute im Free-TV! | Sport
articles.description: Werden wir Weltmeister? So sehen Sie das Basketball-WM-Finale heute im Free-TV.
articles.content:
Werden wir Weltmeister?
Nach dem sensationellen Sieg im Halbfinale gegen Mega-Favorit USA (113:111) steht die deutsche Nationalmannschaft im Finale der Basketball-Weltmeisterschaft. Heute gegen Serb… [+1266 chars]

articles.author: Brian Windhorst
articles.title: Team USA loses OT thriller to Canada in World Cup bronze medal game - ESPN
articles.description: Team USA lost a thrilling overtime contest at the World Cup to Canada, which won a major international medal in men's basketball for the first time in 87 years.
articles.content: MANILA, Philippines -- An NBA game broke out at the FIBA World Cup on Sunday, with Team USA and Team Canada falling into the high-octane, free-flowing, star vs. star game they are so comfortable with… [+3416 chars]

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Canada beats U.S. in OT for bronze at men's Basketball World Cup | CBC Sports
articles.description: Canada won the bronze-medal match at the FIBA men's Basketball World Cup on Sunday in Manila, Philippines. The Canadians did it in dramatic fashion, taking a 127-118 overtime win against the United States.
articles.content:
Canada won the bronze-medal match at the FIBA men's Basketball World Cup on Sunday in Manila, Philippines.
The Canadians did it in dramatic fashion, taking a 127-118 overtime win against the United … [+165 chars]

articles.author: Beatrice Go
articles.title: How dark horses Serbia, Germany reached the 2023 FIBA World Cup final
articles.description: Serbia and Germany defeated NBA star-studded USA and Canada to make it an all-Europe 2023 basketball World Cup final.
articles.content:
Manila, Philippines Most fans and experts had predicted a North-American basketball World Cup final, with the USA and Canada both built on NBA stars.
But while Serbia and Germany may lack their riva… [+8483 chars]

articles.author: Dominik Rosing
articles.title: Basketball-Experte Alex Vogel: „Dieses Team ist auf einer Mission!“
articles.description: Die deutsche Basketball-Nationalmannschaft steht sensationell im WM-Finale. Selbst Topfavorit USA kann die DBB-Truppe nicht stoppen. Jetzt wartet im Endspiel Serbien. TV-Experte Alex Vogel erklärt im Interview, was unsere Basketballer so stark macht.
articles.content: Die deutsche Basketball-Nationalmannschaft steht sensationell im WM-Finale. Selbst Topfavorit USA kann die DBB-Truppe nicht stoppen. Jetzt wartet im Endspiel Serbien. TV-Experte Alex Vogel erklärt im… [+7929 chars]
